deity_markdown: [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213), Desna, Nocticula, Sarenrae, Tsukiyo
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Battle of the Pantheons Winner Announcement](/Sources.aspx?ID=42) pg. 1</row>

The Path of the Heavens is well known to those who make their way in Golarion. Looking down from above, these deities help travelers and voyagers find their path. Their guidance can be literal, or for others, more spiritual—some worshippers seek to know the progress of [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16) (the sun), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=48) (the moon), and [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5) (the stars) and through this knowledge gain enlightenment. [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=45), the last member of the pantheon, for her part uses the cover of the darkness, the gaps in between the others, to shelter travelers and outcasts. Some who worship her as their primary deity in the pantheon seek to use the void between the stars to defend voyagers on the road. Though this is frowned upon by the other members of the Path of the Heavens, it does not seem to disrupt the harmony between the gods.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** guide travelers; observe the movements of the moon, planets, and stars

**Anathema** mislead a traveler, permanently blind an enemy

**Area of Concern**
Celestial bodies, navigation, travelers

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG, CN

**Pantheon Members**
[Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=45), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=48)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Favored Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)

**Domains** [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=52), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39), [Void](/Domains.aspx?ID=56)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)

- **2nd**
[Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121)

- **3rd**
[Gravity Well](/Spells.aspx?ID=577)

</column>
name: The Path of the Heavens
